visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark gray color (#333) for axis labels and titles, with a font size of 14px. Data series: The series should be named 'Temperature' and contain the data provided in the JavaScript code. Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color (#f0f0f0), add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is specified as 'spline', and the background color is set to a light gray (#f0f0f0). The chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides to provide ample space around the chart. The axes and labels are styled with a dark gray color (#333) and a font size of 14px. The x-axis title is 'Month', and the y-axis title is 'Temperature (°C)'. The data series is named 'Temperature' and contains the provided temperature data. The series color is a gradient from light blue (#ADD8E6) to dark blue (#00008B). Additionally, a legend is included at the bottom of the chart, centered and styled with the same dark gray color and font size.
